description: '''Nathan Alexander Evans''' (born 19 December 1994) is a Scottish singer and songwriter. Evans first gained fame in 2020 by posting videos of himself singing [[Sea shanty|sea shanties]] on social media service [[TikTok]]. In 2021, he released a cover of the folk song "[[Wellerman#Nathan Evans version|Wellerman]]", which peaked at the top of the [[UK Singles Chart]] and also charted in several other countries.
